sen.e: In 1177, his father, FUJIWARA no Narichika conspired to overthrow the Taira family with Saiko and Shunkai, personal attendants to the Emperor, at a mountain villa in Shishigatani.

sen.e: The "Tale of Heike" describes the scene of Naritsune bemoaning bad fortune with his pregnant wife, and Norimori pleading to Kiyomori to spare the life of his son-in-law.
